00106 template <typename MessageType>
00107 bool CMessageContainer::RegisterMessageType(const QByteArray& messageTypeId)
00108 {
00109        QByteArray realTypeId = messageTypeId;
00110 
00111        if (realTypeId.isEmpty()){
00112               realTypeId = istd::CClassInfo::GetName<MessageType>();
00113        }
00114        
00115        return GetMessageFactory().RegisterFactory(new istd::TSingleFactory<iser::IObject, MessageType>(realTypeId), true);
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 #define I_REGISTER_MESSAGE_TYPE(messageType)\
00120 static struct DefaultMessageTypesRegistrator_##messageType\
00121 {\
00122        DefaultMessageTypesRegistrator_##messageType()\
00123        {\
00124               ilog::CMessageContainer::RegisterMessageType<messageType>();\
00125        }\
00126 } s_defaultMessageTypesRegistrator_##messageType;
